dmca.title: Grupo Planeta DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google

works.description:
According to the protocol of the DMCA (Digital Millennium Copyright Act),   
reaffirming the points of our complaint sent days ago:

1. We have noted that the http://taquillavagos.blogspot.com/ website owned,  
is offering free downloads of various works belonging to Grupo Planeta, and  
in particular the section “El amor y otras cosas imposibles”, “El discurso  
del rey” and “Arthur y la Guerra de los dos mundos” DEAPLANETA property,  
belonging to Grupo Planeta.

2. Please note that Grupo Planeta is the exclusive holder, through  
different legal entities of the Group members, the rights of the author of  
numerous works that free download is available on its website and in  
particular, the work cited therefore copying, reproduction, plagiarism,  
distribution and / or publicly performed without our consent not only  
contravenes the provisions of the Copyright Spanish Laws.

3. DeAPlaneta, S.L.U.. is a Spanish company, with CIF B62490461, domiciled  
at 08034 Barcelona (Spain), Avenida Diagonal 662-664, Tel: (+34) 934928164,  
Fax: (+34) 934928560.


For all the foregoing, I hereby require you to immediately withdraw from  
its website all the works being owned by companies belonging to Grupo  
Planeta, and specifically cited the work as indicated in previous lines,  
leaving distributing them for free.


Sincerely,

Grupo Planeta
Asesoría Jurídica
Avda. Diagonal 662-664, Planta 8ª
08034 Barcelona
Tel.: (+34) 93 492 81 64
Fax: (+34) 93 492 85 64
